name: Size Matters Not
prompt: So this little green alien started talking about politics, but now I'm trying to download more RAM and I need to know the exact sizes of the variables in this place to know how much to get. Give me int, char, float, and then double

tests.output:
The size of a int in C is 4 bytes
The size of a char in C is 1 bytes
The size of a float in C is 4 bytes
The size of a double in C is 8 bytes
